title: krogothmanhattan
author: krogothmanhattan
content: I have checked my CryptoBonds and the funding wallet is still intact.     Unfortunalty you cannot sweep the BTC until the Locktime date or Block is met   However, If you want to know if YOUR CRYPTOBOND funding wallet is intact, please DM me your raw hex DATA that can be found in your large QR code.   I can then find the BTC addy and send you the funding wallets BTC addy and you can keep an eye on that and if anything is amisss before you sweep you will know by tracking it.   Hope this helps you all.   P.S. And NO I cannot steal your BTC by knowing the raw hex data.....even if I broadcast it it will only goto to your card and your card alone.

comments.author: Agrawas
comments.body: Mine have been ready to be shipped for the past 5-6 months which never got shipped..

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: is it possible to keep all the coldkey stuff in the one or two already existing primary threads about the matter? we are now pushing 5 or 6 threads all basically about the same thing - it can make it hard to keep it all straight and to keep everyone informed with so many repetitive threads.

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.body: Quote from: MoparMiningLLC on January 13, 2023, 04:02:35 PMis it possible to keep all the coldkey stuff in the one or two already existing primary threads about the matter? we are now pushing 5 or 6 threads all basically about the same thing - it can make it hard to keep it all straight and to keep everyone informed with so many repetitive threads.  I understand your concern and points...but most of these will be lost in one thread and I need to make people aware that I am willing to help out as well.  One thread...my issues will be lost in there somewhere...by creating a post everyone is aware once started.   But I promise you no new threads will be made. We have to tell people of whats happening and Help them as well.   I already have people DMing me their qr code raw hex data etc etc  Cheers

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: Quote from: krogothmanhattan on January 13, 2023, 04:12:10 PMQuote from: MoparMiningLLC on January 13, 2023, 04:02:35 PMis it possible to keep all the coldkey stuff in the one or two already existing primary threads about the matter? we are now pushing 5 or 6 threads all basically about the same thing - it can make it hard to keep it all straight and to keep everyone informed with so many repetitive threads.  I understand your concern and points...but most of these will be lost in one thread and I need to make people aware that I am willing to help out as well.  One thread...my issues will be lost in there somewhere...by creating a post everyone is aware once started.   But I promise you no new threads will be made. We have to tell people of whats happening and Help them as well.   I already have people DMing me their qr code raw hex data etc etc  CheersI get it - for me it gets lost more easily when there becomes 10 places to go to for one subject because there are 10 different aspects of that subject vs 1 location for the subject that covers all aspects.I prefer the 1 location myself.

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.body: So far all the images of the crypto bonds sent to me I checked and none have been swept yet.  Time will tell of course. Hope they stay intact until the timelock date and/or block is reached and its time to sweep.

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.body: I have come across some Crypto Bond owners who are under the assumption their bonds cannot be swept before the load or broadcast date.         Just so you know, they can.       If the bitcoin in the bitcoin address used to make the timelock/ smartcontract is moved to another wallet then your cryptobond's raw transaction will be useless when broadcast as it will be considered a double spent transaction and thus your Cryptobond will never be loaded as the bitcoin in the raw code address is gone! Blockchain will reject it and your card will never be loaded.

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.body: Well I just checked my Bonds and realized there are different block timelocks for each one   Namely...Block 685296                 Block 895536                 Block 790416    Current Block is 783769...SO I missed that we are past one of the Bonds and it could be broadcast and redeemed.    I just did that for one of my binds after confirming all the bonds have no been swept YET...time will tell though.   Sucsessful in reclaiming at least one bond so far! Lets hope this piece of shit does not sweep the rest.   SO to everyone who has the bonds....Broadcast the one you can and sweep!! Time is of the essence!https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5447391.msg62027514#msg62027514

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: yes i believe in one of the threads about all of this, i did mention i had redeemed one of mine and that the second would be redeemable in a few months.

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.body: I can confirm....I checked my two remaining shitbonds and he has swiped the one for block 685296 with a value of 0.00105 BTC   Scum bag struck again.    There are two btc addys on a timelock....one is the receiving end after the broadcast and the other the loading end.     He stole the initial loading wallet!  Goodjob SCUMKEY! Hell has a place reserved just for your fat ass!

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.created_time: May 13, 2023, 09:11:05 PMLast edit: May 13, 2023, 09:25:36 PM by MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: I have created time locks for myself - really from one of my addresses to another of my addresses but i then deleted the keys to the first address so I could never spend the funds - only broadcast the txn in the future.I asked krogoth how to decode yoggs txn and this is what I got:Code:{    "addresses": [        "bc1ql0ckf6myqjy7amlucvt3rufphd4vfvu9f8dnrk",        "bc1qtx2vfyhlrzt5ftpl6xkmyrsktcdth5uggmvx5t"    ],    "block_height": -1,    "block_index": -1,    "confirmations": 0,    "double_spend": false,    "fees": 5000,    "hash": "3cf1c12da9bf908875477cec8a5c1c85336e6a0206fd51018c3d92fe298458cd",    "inputs": [        {            "addresses": [                "bc1qtx2vfyhlrzt5ftpl6xkmyrsktcdth5uggmvx5t"            ],            "age": 629810,            "output_index": 5,            "output_value": 105000,            "prev_hash": "25834a5633203402a34d64c6ec223ab4a0f9cbf9140b9319495db212010d05bf",            "script_type": "pay-to-witness-pubkey-hash",            "sequence": 4294967294,            "witness": [                "304402205d77e3da348fde5c1f9de5a3ec0ca9520f760e35e75381b361ead9e309fc342f022060708afc815aba84ab57e7e11df8e1e110bbc42b210fde60d0a7b251c0b0467801",                "03cc2cc807e9476b79754b81f8804e23ceb335cd0ca3bd3c701ef77c3bba65fa72"            ]        }    ],    "lock_time": 895536,    "outputs": [        {            "addresses": [                "bc1ql0ckf6myqjy7amlucvt3rufphd4vfvu9f8dnrk"            ],            "script": "0014fbf164eb640489eeeffcc31711f121bb6ac4b385",            "script_type": "pay-to-witness-pubkey-hash",            "value": 100000        }    ],    "preference": "low",    "received": "2023-05-13T20:58:56.036698217Z",    "relayed_by": "3.239.224.19",    "size": 191,    "total": 100000,    "ver": 2,    "vin_sz": 1,    "vout_sz": 1,    "vsize": 110}the first address is the cards address so shows no txnsthe second address shows the funding address - which on 4/25/2023 he emptied my funds (along with 12 other cards) and sent to this address:  bc1qty5ugy4f09ym6sc8sn43rl4wnyxjp82c838glxwhich promptly sent to this address:32yZEAztUcT461wYU96HfKjYvpq9csGAbUwhich is where the funds are sitting now.this is for the 2025 card - the 2023 one is still funded but he can take that at any time.NOTE: THE 2023 CARDS COME ACTIVE IN 826 BLOCKS - IF ASSUMING 10 MINS PER BLOCK THAT IS 5.73 DAYS - PEEL YOUR 2023 CARDS NOW, IMPORT THE KEYS - BROADCAST TXN AS SOON AS YOU CAN AND SWEEP THE FUNDS ASAP
